abstract: The longtime co-host of “Today” moved to ABC and its parent, the Walt Disney Company, to host a syndicated talk show. Next week, she will be up against her old show.
snippet: The longtime co-host of “Today” moved to ABC and its parent, the Walt Disney Company, to host a syndicated talk show. Next week, she will be up against her old show.
lead_paragraph: Next week, Katie Couric will co-host the news on ABC’s “Good Morning America.”

headline.main: For a Week, Couric Will Co-Host ‘Good Morning America’
